['DescriptionExclusive With Blue chip Reem Mira 4 Type 3E its 3bed +maid room Villa For sale . Villa is Rented till April 2020 @125000 AED  1 Cheque and Rent is Refundable.
BUA  AREA is  2554 Sqft  Plot Size 3385 SQ ft   Close To  pool and park.
Turf Landscaped Garden.
 Selling price 1.6 net .
Reem is set to become one of the first gated communities in Dubai to house a large central park. Featuring camping facilities, sand surfing, and camel riding trails, Reem is inspired by nature.
Reem community offers a modern interpretation of the soothing charm of the desert oasis. The residential development will feature several residential communities, which will be unveiled in phases. 
Residents will become part of an exotic neighbor hood that features an exclusive desert botanical park, camping facilities, sand surfing and camel riding trails, go karting track, dune buggies, rock climbing wall, and a skate park.
Anchored by a sweeping central park, Reem’s common areas will feature fountains as well as a centre piece water feature. A residents’ club, restaurants and cafes, nurseries and primary schools, dedicated jogging and bicycle paths, a cricket pitch and several football fields, a miniature golf course, and an amphitheatre outdoor cinema are all set within the neighbourhood.
Adding to the leisure choices of residents, Reem development in Dubai is in close proximity to the Arabian Ranches Golf Club, Dubai Polo & Equestrian Club, and Global Village.
Call for more detils zia  +971551276345/+97143951212 BRN 26890 ORN 308']

descriptions: ['DescriptionIf you have always dreamed of living right on one of the best beaches in the world, reality can trump your dream at Jumeirah Beach Residence. Located just south Dubai Marina, JBR sits right on Arabian Gulf. It was designed to become one of the Middle East’s premier residential and vacation spots and it hasn’t let its initial target down! Beachfront cafes, world-class hotels, delightful shopping experience, excellent walking environment are here to entertain you.\nThis community is vibrant and dynamic both night and day, thanks to its key feature, a beautiful stretch of beach, that runs parallel to the community and includes parking, retail, and food options; in addition, The Walk at JBR is a series of restaurants, cafes, retail shops, beauty salons, and other convenience outlets built on the ground floor level of the residential towers\nThe swimming pools and gym are on the plaza level access, with the security entrance and access to retails shops, restaurants, and supermarkets, others']

descriptions: ['DescriptionSpectacularly located on the beach, Vida Residences in\xa0Dubai Creek Harbour is a 33-storey branded tower adjacent to the award-winning Vida Hotel. It occupies the perfect location and it is just a short hop from Dubai Creek Tower, Dubai Square, and Creek Marina. Homeowners can choose between 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments and indulge in award-winning hotel service, a fresh wave of beach activities, and endless discoveries at the nearby Dubai Creek Tower and Dubai Square. Amenities include swimming pool, fully equipped gym, luxury spa, private courtyards and waterfront dining areas. Dubai Creek Harbour is at the heart of a bold new vision for Dubai. With spectacular cultural offerings, world-class residences, shopping, amenities, offices and more, Dubai Creek Harbour represents the net frontier in contemporary life, work and play. Positioned within the Creek and roughly 2.5km from the mangroves of the Ras Al Khor bird sanctuary, this island is separated from the mainland by a canal approximately 100m wide.\xa0 300-Metre Beach 24/7 Valet Parking Waterfront Dining Luxury Spa 24/7 Concierge Service Breathtaking Sunset Views Call Amal on +971506114710 for more detailsLimited Availability']

descriptions: ['DescriptionThe statuesque Harbour Views are the tallest twin towers on Creek Island. Home to more than 750 one, two and three-bedroom glass-fronted apartments, the premium residences soar 51 floors above the glistening Dubai Creek. Anchored to a three-level podium comprising additional apartments and 14 exclusive villas overlooking the park, this ultra-modern, multi-functioning structure represents a brand-new vision for urban living.Soaring high above Creek Marina, Harbour Views is located in the verdant parkland area of Creek Island. Fed by the circular boulevard, it is within walking distance of Emaar Square, the global retail destination, a 10-minute drive from Downtown Dubai and 15 minutes from Dubai International Airport.Amenities:- Fully Equipped Gym- Outdoor Swimming Pool- Squash Court- Kids Play Area, Kids Pool- Cafes, Restaurants- Retails- Walking Distance to Metro- Direct access to Park and BoulevardSize Ranges in SQF1 Bed 707 - 8332 Bed 1,143 - 1,2003 Bed 1,526 - 1,726Dubai Creek Harbour is at the heart of our bold new vision for Dubai. It is where The Nest Tallest Tower in the World is. The 6 sq km waterfront destination is bound to push the frontiers of architecture, design and the quality of life. Home to pink flamingos, nature with 450 wildlife species. Imagine living near water and nature across the Downtown yet still be within 10-15min drive from the city.For viewing and booking all Hend Karam on +971507549654 or visit www.providentestate.com for further details.Company name: Provident Real EstateRERA ORN: 1933 Address: Office #702, Al Barsha 1, Al Zarooni Bldg.
